title: Kelis Peduzine
text: Kelis Johana Peduzine Vargas (born 21 April 1983) is a Colombian retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for the <a href="Colombia%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Colombia women's national football team</a>. She competed at the <a href="2011%20FIFA%20Women%27s%20World%20Cup">2011 FIFA Women's World Cup</a> and the <a href="Football%20at%20the%202012%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Women%27s%20tournament">2012 Summer Olympics</a>. At the club level, she played for <a href="CD%20Eba">CD Eba</a>.
